title: Iulian Hartig
text:
Iulian Hartig (born 11 October 1998) is a <a href="Romanian%20people">Romanian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played as a <a href="prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a> for professional <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> club <a href="CSM%20Bucure%C8%99ti%20%28rugby%29">CSM București</a>.
Club career.
Hartig started playing rugby as a youth for Romanian club Clubul Sportiv Școlar nr. 2 Baia Mare. In 2017 he was signed by Romanian SuperLiga side, CSM București.
International career.
Hartig is also selected for Romania's national team, the <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Oaks</a>, making his international debut at the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20Europe%20Championship%23Week%203">2019 Rugby Europe Championship</a> in a match against "<a href="Spain%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Los Leones</a>".
